snippet.title: Create your own web service for an iOS app, part one
snippet.description: Follow the steps in this tutorial to learn how to create the web service backend for an iOS app called iGlobe.

snippet.title: How to install and use CodeIgniter on your server
snippet.description: Building web applications is becoming increasingly important to growing SMBs. CodeIgniter is a PHP framework that enables developers to build and test web applications faster.

snippet.title: PowerShell script for getting Active Directory information
snippet.description: Scott Lowe shares a PowerShell script he wrote to extract a number of fields from Active Directory and write the extracted information into a CSV file.

snippet.title: Seamlessly integrate applications with eBay using its Windows SDK
snippet.description: The eBay Windows SDK allows you to easily access eBay data within your application. Tony Patton gives you an overview of the functionality provided by the eBay Web services API.
